19cc4e42-39bb-41f9-b9de-9f2940eed6a2.overall_goal: Clean the car area and manage cleaning tools by retrieving, using, and storing them.

episodes.name: Clean car area
episodes.description: The person picks up a mop-stick, sweeps the floor in the car, manages the door, places the mop-stick down, and puts a cloth inside the car.

episodes.name: Retrieve supplies
episodes.description: The person moves to a cabinet, opens it, picks up a cloth, moves to the wall, and picks a mop-stick from the wall.

fbf4150a-27d2-48a4-956f-b4f85ecde465.overall_goal: Pack away a laptop, then set it up on a table with power, keyboard, and mouse, and resume input.

episodes.name: Shut down and stow
episodes.description: The person finishes typing, presses the laptopâ€™s button, closes it, unplugs the charger, and puts the laptop away.

954c2f61-64ad-4c89-a26f-ec4547a65fab.overall_goal: Prepare onions and start cooking by washing, cutting/peeling them, filling a pot, and turning on the cooker.

episodes.name: Rinse onion
episodes.description: The person turns on the tap, washes the onion, and turns the tap off.

277b18de-4ad9-4c09-970b-91fcea05097d.overall_goal: The person organizes tools, packs a box, tightens fasteners with wrench and spanner, handles a wheel, and performs a final tightening.

episodes.name: Sort tools
episodes.description: The person picks and places a wrench, plier, and spanner to organize them.

e9be1118-a5cf-4431-b2e8-e3edcfa9f949.overall_goal: Prepare and join wood pieces by fastening, clamping, and drilling on a workbench.

episodes.name: Fasten, clamp, drill
episodes.description: The person drives a screw into wood, repositions and clamps the materials, then drills two holes while alternately holding the wood and the wood-piece.

episodes.name: Prepare next screw
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver and a screw and positions the screw on the wood-piece.

f5c27b88-a3eb-4290-9102-0307c2809241.overall_goal: Organize and clean a bookshelf by moving books, removing dust, and wiping surfaces.

episodes.name: Arrange and Shelve
episodes.description: The person arranges a book, places it on the floor, shelves and aligns it, then takes a book off the shelf.

97ad4e58-c64f-47e3-8d84-6aad38bdfbc8.overall_goal: Install and tighten bolts on a machine by positioning them and securing with a screwdriver, while staging and handling tools with both hands.

episodes.name: First bolt installation
episodes.description: The person stages tools, positions a bolt on the machine, stabilizes it, tightens it with a screwdriver, and releases it.

episodes.name: Second bolt installation
episodes.description: The person places the screwdriver down, positions another bolt on the machine, stabilizes it with the other hand, tightens it, and releases it.

a20c2c22-cc2c-487e-8041-f0b33f4845ca.overall_goal: Attach and secure fabric to furniture by cutting, gluing, nailing, and trimming.

episodes.name: Initial Cutting
episodes.description: The person picks up scissors, holds the fabric, cuts it, then puts the scissors down and releases the fabric.

860980fb-f992-4bb1-8a46-b644f58090e2.overall_goal: Assemble and prepare a paper craft by positioning materials, folding paper, attaching cardboard, and applying glue with a brush.

episodes.name: Position metal board
episodes.description: The person picks up a metal board, places it onto paper, and adjusts its position.

15d4a2c1-1cb8-4b76-a66a-adb20b7e96cb.overall_goal: Examine a card on a table by probing it, repeatedly picking it up to check, and placing it back down.

episodes.name: Initial probing
episodes.description: The person touches and taps the card on the table with hand1 to locate or select it.

5533ab65-7463-47a6-b040-c0c6d65b8cf5.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble motorcycle components by positioning parts and tightening fasteners with a screwdriver and wrench.

episodes.name: Prep wheel and tag
episodes.description: The person folds a tag, adjusts the tyre, and rotates the wheel to prepare components for assembly.

5293587a-e6c4-4760-8277-cf284588aac3.overall_goal: Wash dishes and put them away in their storage places.

episodes.name: Wash spoon and saucer
episodes.description: The person sets up the tap, rinses and scrubs a spoon and a saucer, and places them on the drying rack after briefly handling a cup.

episodes.name: Soap wash and store
episodes.description: The person adds soap to the sponge, scrubs and rinses a cup and places it on the drying rack, then stores dried items on a shelf and in a drawer before washing a mug.

ab5f1a57-29b3-4c07-bc82-bed0b1c3d42f.overall_goal: Clean dishes by washing and rinsing a bowl and a mug at the sink, then drying them with a towel and placing the bowl on the table.

episodes.name: Wash bowl
episodes.description: The person opens the tap, holds, washes, and rinses the bowl, then closes the tap.

d4fc1fd7-c725-454e-9d2b-0fbc774e81d6.overall_goal: Assemble engine components by preparing tools, fastening a bolt, applying glue, and carrying a ring toward a machine.

episodes.name: Tool preparation
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush and a container, dips the brush into the container, sets the container down, and picks up a wrench.

episodes.name: Bolt assembly workflow
episodes.description: The person places and holds a bolt on the engine, tightens it with a wrench, releases it, sets down the wrench, picks up a tissue to clean hand2, puts down the tissue, picks up the bolt, applies glue to the bolt with a brush in hand1, puts down the brush, picks up a ring, and moves toward the machine with the ring.

efa59c4e-71de-4184-9c82-f78efd4d4702.overall_goal: Assemble a bicycle by installing pedals and brakes, connecting and adjusting cables, positioning the frame, and mounting and tightening the wheels.

episodes.name: Install Pedal
episodes.description: The person picks up a pedal, attaches it to the bicycle frame, tightens the bolt with a wrench, then releases the bolt and puts down the tool.

a5a0a366-8721-413f-8412-66cf69b23b18.overall_goal: Organize and clean dishes and utensils by moving them to the countertop, wiping them with a cloth, and returning them to the cupboard and drawer.

episodes.name: Stow cloth
episodes.description: The person opens the cupboard, places a cloth inside, and closes it.

2ae97f2a-b16d-467b-b73a-721cb00996f1.overall_goal: Prepare dough pieces for baking by mixing, kneading, rolling, cutting, arranging in a pan, and brushing with oil.

episodes.name: Mix Bowl Contents
episodes.description: The person picks up a spatula and mixes the bowl contents, then puts the spatula down.

3ea57fa2-fd76-48c1-923e-e90b14373c7e.overall_goal: Prepare dough by loading flour, sugar, and water into a mixer, mixing, then kneading, rolling, and cutting the dough.

episodes.name: Add Flour to Mixer
episodes.description: The person picks up flour from a shelf, carries it, pours it into the mixer, and places the flour back on the table.

episodes.name: Mix and Process Dough
episodes.description: The person adds sugar and water, operates the mixer, takes out and places the dough, repeatedly kneads and adjusts it, brings a pan, rolls the dough, cuts it with a knife, and places the knife on the table.

203ee455-6f60-4e08-bd89-28e2ca3927da.overall_goal: Prepare dough and ingredients, manage the tray and oven, and mix contents for baking.

episodes.name: Load and set oven
episodes.description: The person opens the oven, loads a tray, closes it, and sets the oven timer.

episodes.name: Clean countertop
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth and wipes the countertop, then puts the cloth down.

8be918b2-c819-4a84-98dc-5fe24835a4ac.overall_goal: Prepare the area, paint the door frame, and then secure and organize the paint materials.

episodes.name: Initial brush dip
episodes.description: The person dips the paintbrush into the paint can using hand1.

episodes.name: Paint door frame
episodes.description: The person holds the door frame with hand2, paints it with a paintbrush using hand1, re-dips, and continues painting.

episodes.name: Prep and cleanup
episodes.description: The person releases the door, lays plastic wrap on the floor, positions and opens the paint can, uses the brush briefly, adds more wrap, puts the brush down, then replaces and presses the lid before placing the can on the wrap.

44ae604b-2e16-497d-a018-03495d8d5654.overall_goal: Wash and prepare the car using a bucket, hose, sponge, and towel.

episodes.name: Setup and Rinse
episodes.description: The person sets down the bucket, handles the hose to rinse the car, then dries it with a towel.

a0d6bd8e-c477-442b-bab3-731775b44b43.overall_goal: Wash a car using water, a hose, a bucket, and a sponge.

episodes.name: Prepare and Rinse
episodes.description: The person dries the car with a towel, opens the tap to fill and move a bucket to the car, briefly sprays the car with a hose, and wets the sponge.

episodes.name: Scrub Car Body
episodes.description: The person raises the wiper, supports the surface, washes and moves the sponge on the car, flips and re-dips the sponge, then continues washing.

episodes.name: Lower Wiper
episodes.description: The person lowers the wiper back down with the off hand.

3c80ddb5-5046-4d97-9162-5e5a87ccb2fd.overall_goal: Organize tools and service a car bolt using a wrench.

episodes.name: Get wrench
episodes.description: The person opens the toolbox and picks up a wrench with hand1.

episodes.name: Stage and load tools
episodes.description: The person holds the car bolt, moves the toolbox near the car and onto the workbench, opens the cabinet, and picks up a wrench and screwdriver to place them into the toolbox.

episodes.name: Stow tools, service bolt
episodes.description: The person closes and stores the toolbox in the cabinet, then loosens, removes, places, retrieves, holds, and tightens the bolt using the wrench.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: close, put-down, pick-up, move, place, loosen, remove, hold, tighten

05c937ff-816b-46b8-8ae2-864eae85e987.overall_goal: Prepare and finish a stand by positioning it on the table, removing it from its source, sanding it with sandpaper, and adjusting it for final placement.

episodes.name: Position and remove
episodes.description: The person holds, rotates, and aligns the stand on the table using both hands, then removes it from its source.

episodes.name: Inspect and sand
episodes.description: The person inspects and holds the stand, picks up sandpaper to smoothen the stand with hand2, then places the sandpaper and stand on the table and adjusts the stand with both hands.

4f68183f-610a-44de-b102-e7f300b49dcd.overall_goal: Prepare dough by mixing, kneading, and adding flour, sugar, yeast, and water.

episodes.name: Cover and mix
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth from the countertop, covers the bowl, and mixes the ingredient in the bowl.

3c18ec5c-7e6b-400d-9260-70598e04a373.overall_goal: Pot a plant by setting up the pot, adding soil, and cleaning up the workspace.

episodes.name: Position the pot
episodes.description: The person picks up the pot and places it on the table with one hand.

episodes.name: Potting and cleanup
episodes.description: The person plants the plant in the pot, adds soil from a bag using a trowel, sets the bag aside, and cleans the table.

d851b431-8551-492b-8332-bd46c3bfdaba.overall_goal: Pot a plant by placing it in a planter and transferring soil from a bag into the planter using a trowel.

episodes.name: Plant placement and fill
episodes.description: The person places a plant in a planter and begins transferring soil from a bag into it with a trowel, then sets the trowel down.

episodes.name: Continue soil filling
episodes.description: After releasing the bag, the person continues scooping soil from the bag and pouring it into the planter with the trowel, then releases the planter.

episodes.name: Reset and resume
episodes.description: The person resets the trowel, picks it up again, holds the bag to scoop more soil from it, then releases the bag and holds the planter.

dabf199a-bf55-440d-8aeb-77ead18097ae.overall_goal: Attach fabric to a door and secure the door hardware by loosening, inserting a nut, and tightening with tools.

episodes.name: Attach fabric and adjust
episodes.description: The person attaches fabric to the door, then stabilizes and adjusts a bolt using a screwdriver before setting the tool down.

episodes.name: Replace and tighten nut
episodes.description: The person releases the bolt, works with a wrench and spanner to loosen hardware, temporarily stores and retrieves the nut, inserts it, and finishes tightening with the wrench.

1560b9ee-e2da-4dda-a875-52e5bae8d88a.overall_goal: Assemble and then disassemble a wire-to-plug connection using a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Gather and Loosen
episodes.description: The person picks up a plug and a screwdriver from the table and loosens the nut in the plug.

5bc29170-aa13-4dd7-bb48-2790f676463c.overall_goal: Repair and secure an electrical cable connection by cutting and preparing wires, inspecting and testing, joining and insulating, then restoring power and securing the terminal.

episodes.name: Initial wire prep
episodes.description: The person handles a wall wire, picks up a knife, cuts the wire, and sets the items down.

c4d332b2-7fcc-4993-b9ea-26d6f794984f.overall_goal: Harvest leaves from a plant using pruning shears and collect them in a basket.

episodes.name: Position the basket
episodes.description: The person picks up and carries the basket, then places it on the ground.

df0fa70d-600e-477b-aaea-275f86ff7010.overall_goal: Service and install a gauge on a motorcycle wheel, then perform adjustments and final inspection.

episodes.name: Preparation and setup
episodes.description: The person prepares components and tools, tightens screws on the gauge, cleans and checks it, fetches tools from a drawer, manipulates metal with a hammer, and retrieves a screw from a carton.

episodes.name: Insert and adjust gauge
episodes.description: Holding the gauge, the person inserts a screw into it, examines and adjusts the gauge with pliers, then puts down the pliers and releases the gauge.

episodes.name: Mount and finalize
episodes.description: The person picks up a wrench, mounts and tightens the gauge on the wheel, taps and adjusts, cleans, and conducts final checks while moving the motorcycle.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: Actions: hold, fix, tighten, put-down, pick-up, hit, adjust, release, clean, check, pull, move, examine

32e25924-9d92-4030-a328-11e2c4c7ac56.overall_goal: Prepare, season, and bake shaped dough on a tray in the oven.

episodes.name: Shape dough and tray
episodes.description: The person manipulates the dough by transferring, dipping, twisting, shaping, and rolling it, prepares the tray, and places the dough onto the tray.

episodes.name: Brush egg wash
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush, brushes the dough with egg wash, and puts the brush down on the table.

episodes.name: Season and bake
episodes.description: The person sprinkles salt on the dough, carries the tray to the oven, places it inside, closes the oven door, and sets the timer.

c1ef9d03-1278-4216-b1e4-b1a298a892d9.overall_goal: Cut dough into strips and load them into a tray positioned on a rack.

episodes.name: Approach table
episodes.description: The person moves to the table to begin working.

episodes.name: Prepare and cut
episodes.description: The person scrapes dough from the table, positions a tray on a rack, then holds and cuts the dough into strips with a scraper.

episodes.name: Load strips to tray
episodes.description: The person releases the dough, picks up dough strips, carries them to the tray, and drops them in.

950f70a4-f90b-4a15-97a0-c14ad6960285.overall_goal: Wash various kitchen items, put them away, and clean the sink and counter.

episodes.name: Wash sieve
episodes.description: The person picks up a sponge, turns on the tap, holds a sieve, washes it, and puts the sponge down.

episodes.name: Finish sieve, wash plate
episodes.description: They rinse and dry the sieve, put items down, then turn water on and wash a plate while holding it.

episodes.name: Rinse plate, move dishes
episodes.description: The person rinses and dries the plate, then carries a pizza tray and plates from the table to the sink and sets them in.

episodes.name: Move sieve, wash pan
episodes.description: They bring the sieve to the sink, then turn on water and wash a pan while holding it.

episodes.name: Rinse pan, store items
episodes.description: The person rinses and dries the pan, then places clean dishes into the cupboard, wipes the counter, and prepares the sponge and tap.

episodes.name: Wash sink
episodes.description: They wash the sink basin using the sponge.

episodes.name: Dry sink, wash tray
episodes.description: After turning off water, the person dries the sink, stages a pan from the stove to the sink, then turns water on to wash a pizza tray.

episodes.name: Rinse and dry tray
episodes.description: They rinse the pizza tray under the tap, turn the tap off, dry it with a towel, and put the towel down.

583ff0cb-4697-4f63-b525-bf5bc2318117.overall_goal: Prepare, bake, and handle dough while setting up and operating nearby equipment in a kitchen.

episodes.name: Prep and Bake
episodes.description: The person sprinkles flour, kneads dough, manages the oven, and handles dough/bread around the table and cooling rack.

episodes.name: Roll the Dough
episodes.description: The person handles a rolling pin and rolls the dough on the table.

episodes.name: Setup Machine
episodes.description: The person carries a tray to the dough machine, places it by the machine, and operates the machine.

f35817ce-c97c-4795-b92d-bfd71aa3c7de.overall_goal: Assemble and secure components on a motorbike by placing parts, tightening/loosening fasteners, and handling tools and materials.

episodes.name: Secure initial bolt
episodes.description: The person positions a bolt on the motorbike, stabilizes the bike, tightens the bolt with a screwdriver, then sets down the tool and releases the bike.

episodes.name: Loosen a screw
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver, stabilizes the motorbike, and untightens a screw.

episodes.name: Fit cover and bolt
episodes.description: The person releases and removes the loosened screw, sets down tools and screw, places a cover and tightens its screws, fetches a box to get a new bolt, installs the bolt on the motorbike, tightens it, and releases the bike.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: release, hold, remove, put-down, pick-up, place, tighten

fefb0892-7e1a-4a34-9418-ea1c96705edc.overall_goal: Clean, arrange, and care for a potted plant.

episodes.name: Clean Pot
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, holds the pot, wipes it clean, then puts the cloth down and releases the pot.

56ddd3b9-5598-4f87-8a90-3f7c810d3e74.overall_goal: Remove the motorbike wheel, secure it for work, then reattach and align it with bolts tightened and rotation checked.

episodes.name: Loosen wheel fasteners
episodes.description: The person alternates tools to unscrew bolts and screws on the wheel, taps to loosen, and places tools back on the workbench.

episodes.name: Remove and secure wheel
episodes.description: The person lifts the wheel off the motorbike, places it on a vice, then uses a wrench to screw in bolts and sets the tool down.

episodes.name: Reattach and align
episodes.description: The person lifts the wheel from the vice, attaches it to the motorbike, tightens bolts, then inspects, adjusts alignment, and checks rotation.

c9a6233c-7a8b-488c-b0ab-bce963c643bd.overall_goal: Assemble and secure parts of a chair using hand tools.

episodes.name: Align and Tap Joint
episodes.description: The person moves a carton, picks up tools, holds the chair joint, taps it with a hammer, then puts down the hammer and releases the joint.

episodes.name: Insert and Tighten Screws
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver, tightens screws, puts it down, inserts a new screw into the chair, picks up the screwdriver again to tighten, then drops it on the platform.

episodes.name: Final Chair Tightening
episodes.description: The person releases, holds, and pulls the chair for alignment, then tightens a bolt on the chair with a spanner using hand1.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: release, hold, pull, tighten

a61ec2b9-bc21-4e55-ac3f-9f52407633cc.overall_goal: The person prepares dough with a scrapper, kneads and flours the surface, transfers it to a pan to bake, then adds water to flour and mixes.

episodes.name: Cut dough prep
episodes.description: The person picks up a scrapper, holds the dough, cuts it, and puts the scrapper down.

episodes.name: Knead by hand
episodes.description: After releasing the dough, the person repeatedly rolls and stretches it with both hands.

a1f09ebf-619d-41fd-841d-56629d803003.overall_goal: Organize the workspace and clean the area by arranging items, preparing with gloves, scraping surfaces, and sweeping up dust.

episodes.name: Prepare and scrape wood
episodes.description: The person arranges items (bucket, tape, paper, sellotape, carpet), puts on a glove, holds wood, scrapes it with a scraper, then sets the tool down and releases the wood.

episodes.name: Organize and clean floor
episodes.description: The person shelves a rod, places a ladder, scrubs the floor with a scraper, then sweeps and collects dust using a broom and dustpan, finishing by putting down the broom.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, place, hold, scrub, put-down, sweep, collect

26b635ab-134a-477c-a22e-e805eed07a9d.overall_goal: Wash and rack dishes using a soapy sponge and running water.

episodes.name: Prepare cleaning tools
episodes.description: The person equips and readies a soapy sponge by wearing a glove, wetting the sponge, applying soap, and setting the items down.

8cf5a53b-fa9c-4fe7-b767-697133d4d5b8.overall_goal: Set up a canvas, paint a book using a brush and palette, then rinse and wipe the brush to finish.

episodes.name: Set up and paint
episodes.description: The person places a canvas on an easel, picks up a paintbrush and palette, mixes paint, and repeatedly dips and paints the book.

episodes.name: Rinse and wipe
episodes.description: The person sets down the palette, uses a water cup to dip and swirl the brush, then wipes the brush with a cloth and puts it down.

4988de48-c77e-406d-8367-68fe2266a8aa.overall_goal: Create and refine a wood sculpture using a chisel and other tools, including measuring, marking, and finishing steps.

episodes.name: Initial carving pass
episodes.description: The person picks up a chisel, carves the wood, inspects the result, and places the chisel on the workbench.

episodes.name: Adjustment and shaping
episodes.description: The person adjusts a machine and the sculpture, iteratively picks up and places the chisel to shave and clean the wood, examines progress, and transfers the chisel between hands.

episodes.name: Clamping and finishing
episodes.description: The person secures the work with a clamp, holds and places the wood, measures and marks it, carves again, then smoothens and brushes off dust, placing the chisel aside.

aa8fcce0-75d1-485f-aede-5d9e6997ad41.overall_goal: Clean the car interior and mats, preparing a cloth with cleaning liquid.

episodes.name: Unlock and Clean Seat
episodes.description: The person removes trash, unlocks and opens the car door, and cleans the seat with a cloth.

episodes.name: Mat Cleaning and Prep
episodes.description: The person removes and brushes the floor mat, returns it to the car, then takes supplies from a bag and pours liquid onto a cloth.

6cfe67ef-f0cc-47f0-8808-31efcf876095.overall_goal: Assemble and secure screws on a furniture piece using a screwdriver, verify alignment and stability, and put away the tools.

episodes.name: Prepare and position
episodes.description: The person gathers the screwdriver and screws and positions the screws on the furniture piece.

41b8254c-ca1e-464c-9323-55301fb5f0e8.overall_goal: Prepare an iced, sweetened drink by gathering tools, adding ice, pouring the beverage, and sweetening it.

episodes.name: Retrieve bottle
episodes.description: The person opens the fridge, picks a bottle, closes the fridge, and places the bottle on the counter.

episodes.name: Prep cup and spoon
episodes.description: They take a spoon from a drawer, set it down, pick a cup and taste the drink, rinse the spoon at the tap, then stir the drink in the cup and place the spoon down.

episodes.name: Add ice cubes
episodes.description: The person opens the freezer, picks an ice-tray, closes the freezer, removes ice-cubes from the tray, and adds them into the cup.

episodes.name: Pour and sweeten
episodes.description: They pick the bottle and pour liquid into the cup, open a jar, place its lid, scoop sugar with a spoon, add it into the cup, and place the spoon back on the counter.

d04f8465-d11f-40d1-8315-302380ec0af4.overall_goal: Modify and inspect a pen by cutting its cover and the pen using a cutter.

episodes.name: Cap modification
episodes.description: The person cuts the penâ€™s cover with a cutter, attaches it to the pen, then removes and sets down the cover and pen.

episodes.name: Cut and inspect pen
episodes.description: The person holds the pen, cuts it with the cutter, puts the cutter down, and inspects the pen.

577f3941-c9f6-45d3-893e-3fd12cffcad1.overall_goal: Inspect the plant, remove the rope tied to it, and clean up.

episodes.name: Inspect and position
episodes.description: The person inspects the plant, clears debris, examines the rope, grips it, and places the plant down to prepare for removal.

episodes.name: Untie and clean up
episodes.description: The person unties, loosens, and untangles the rope from the plant, removes and places it on the ground, collects it into a container, and wipes their hands.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: untie, pull, loosen, check, untangle, inspect, remove, place, collect, wipe

352f1eea-606d-4cd7-906f-733affaf6823.overall_goal: Disassemble a fence section, secure all hardware and tools in a box, and untie a rope.

episodes.name: Move fence board
episodes.description: The person lifts, carries, and places a fence board on the ground.

5ec85bbd-e6c4-46e3-8da5-28576730b35f.overall_goal: Arrange the dining table and prepare a tray by loading it with cups and plates.

episodes.name: Arrange tableware
episodes.description: The person arranges cups, plates, and a dish on the dining table and adjusts their positions.

e8e54409-495b-49e5-b325-556c812d6ff4.overall_goal: The person washes and dries dishes under a running tap using a soapy sponge and towel, then places cleaned items on a rack.

episodes.name: Start Water
episodes.description: The person turns on the tap to start the water flow.

f646012d-baca-46a6-bc03-32047c83f5dc.overall_goal: Clean a camera and attach then remove its cover using a wipe and a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Prepare and Wipe
episodes.description: The person picks up a wipe and the camera, cleans the camera, then sets both back on the table.

episodes.name: Install Cover
episodes.description: The person places the cover onto the camera, then secures it with a screwdriver and puts the tool down.

episodes.name: Clean and Remove
episodes.description: The person holds and cleans the camera, then unscrews the cover and sets the tools down.

831a2da3-bf97-4a79-aa47-16bcdca9e3cd.overall_goal: Prepare the washing machine by moving the laundry, loading clothes, and adding detergent.

episodes.name: Move basket to washer
episodes.description: The person lifts the laundry basket, carries it to the washing machine, sets it down, and adjusts the clothes in the basket.

1db339f1-f887-4e46-86be-2df8eda596db.overall_goal: Fill the carâ€™s fluid reservoirs by fetching, filling, carrying, and pouring water with a bucket while checking for leaks.

episodes.name: Fetch bucket to tap
episodes.description: The person picks up the bucket, walks to the tap, and positions it there.

303505b9-2cf3-488d-ae5f-d72d3bf73585.overall_goal: Prepare, attach, and decorate a cardboard panel on a model train using cutting, glue, cloth, and paint.

episodes.name: Prepare cardboard base
episodes.description: The person cuts and trims the cardboard, tests its fit on the model train, applies glue to it, and returns it to the table.

episodes.name: Attach cloth layer
episodes.description: The person places cloth onto the glued cardboard, presses it firmly, then aligns the cardboard on the train.

episodes.name: Add more glue
episodes.description: The person picks up glue and applies it to the cardboard before setting the glue back on the table.

episodes.name: Press and paint
episodes.description: The person presses the cardboard onto the train, inspects the work, then paints the cardboard while holding it and finally sets the paintbrush down.

92af2e29-8b4c-4a37-bb48-f3b3e4d1901a.overall_goal: Thoroughly clean a car floor mat and reinstall it in the car

episodes.name: Access car interior
episodes.description: The person opens the car door to access the interior and the mat.

episodes.name: Clean and reinstall mat
episodes.description: The person removes the mat from the car, cleans it using cleaner, brush, water hose, towel, and vacuum, then returns and straightens it back in the car.

e03004cc-80ce-4d82-9d09-f50fc82b6456.overall_goal: Prepare a workspace and paint a piece of wood using paint from a can.

episodes.name: Set up workspace
episodes.description: The person lays cardboard on the workbench and places the wood on top.

e08c9103-d6a0-4a43-8276-c8f5e7cfe57f.overall_goal: Prepare the grinder by mounting and securing the wheel, then grind a chisel.

episodes.name: Grinder Setup
episodes.description: The person stages the chisel, mounts and aligns the wheel on the grinder, locks/unlocks with a key, tightens with a wrench, and adjusts the handle.

episodes.name: Grind Chisel
episodes.description: The person holds the chisel, adjusts the handle, and files the chisel using the rotating grinder wheel.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: hold

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: turn, file

d84b8c76-d6b9-4e27-ae66-b010bce5ed1e.overall_goal: Iron the fabric on an ironing board, then check, fold, and move it to a table.

episodes.name: Prepare and first pass
episodes.description: The person arranges the fabric on the ironing board, picks up the iron, holds the fabric, irons it, and then sets the iron down.

episodes.name: Second pass and finish
episodes.description: The person repositions the fabric, irons again, checks by feeling, folds it, and moves the fabric to the table.

1fdbef9f-8aa7-46b1-8063-d1435577608a.overall_goal: Prepare a garment and iron it by laying it on the board and performing repeated pressing and moving strokes with intermittent adjustments.

episodes.name: Preparation and folding
episodes.description: The person lays the garment on the ironing board, puts the iron away, then folds and places the garment.

episodes.name: Ironing cycles
episodes.description: The person retrieves the iron, lays and adjusts the shirt on the board, then repeatedly presses and moves the iron across the fabric with lifts, placements, and periodic adjustments.

e252c493-e587-403d-bd01-22713a1d5a57.overall_goal: Iron and fold a shirt while handling and storing the iron as needed.

episodes.name: Pick up iron
episodes.description: The person picks up the iron from the board using hand1.

episodes.name: Ironing and storage
episodes.description: The person holds the shirt, irons with several passes, places the iron to adjust the shirt, turns it off, briefly stores it in a cabinet, then picks it up again to iron and finally places it on the board.

episodes.name: Move and fold shirt
episodes.description: The person brings the shirt to the board, places and adjusts it, then picks it up and folds it.

ea87324e-d129-425f-b247-e6bcc4ff332c.overall_goal: Perform surface finishing on a piece of wood, including painting, sanding, wiping, and opening a can.

episodes.name: Paint the Wood
episodes.description: The person paints the wood using a paintbrush, repeatedly dipping it into a can while holding the wood, then puts the brush down and releases the wood.

episodes.name: Sand and Wipe
episodes.description: The person sands the wood with sandpaper while holding it, then switches to wiping it with a cloth before putting tools down and releasing the wood.

episodes.name: Open the Can
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver and the can, then opens the can using the screwdriver.

7da432dc-690a-49da-8f44-312c84494c75.overall_goal: Paint the rail with a brush, then secure the paint can and thoroughly clean and store the brush.

episodes.name: Paint the rail
episodes.description: The person paints the rail with a brush, periodically reloading the brush and handling the paint can as needed.

episodes.name: Close and clean
episodes.description: The person places and closes the paint can, then washes the brush in a water bucket and shakes off excess water.

episodes.name: Dry and store
episodes.description: The person holds a cloth to wipe water from the brush and then places the brush on the workbench.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: hold, wipe, place

e8cf9894-0cc7-4480-b490-885308bfb513.overall_goal: Prepare dough pieces on a tray, manage the oven, and apply an egg wash as part of baking preparation.

episodes.name: Dough prep and cutting
episodes.description: The person shapes dough pieces, places them on a tray, cleans the table, prepares the oven and tray, then cuts the dough and releases it.

episodes.name: Oven load and prep
episodes.description: The person opens the oven, loads the tray, closes it, sets the timer, then picks up and dips a brush.

episodes.name: Apply egg wash
episodes.description: The person holds the tray, applies egg to the dough pieces with a brush, then puts the brush down.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: hold, apply, put-down

e43f5b38-213a-4d42-afaa-32c3b77f4da6.overall_goal: Prepare a pizza base by arranging, flouring, rolling, seasoning, and saucing the dough, with brief oven handling.

episodes.name: Set up dough
episodes.description: The person arranges the dough and tray, flours the dough with a cutter, and rolls it with a roller while stabilizing it by hand.

episodes.name: Oven loading
episodes.description: The person sets down the roller, opens the oven, carries the tray to the oven, places it inside, and closes the oven.

episodes.name: Season dough
episodes.description: The person picks up a container to sprinkle spice onto the dough, then picks up a bottle to pour oil, setting each item down afterward.

c7cc9fbf-e47a-4bc7-9f08-7ff6954a787a.overall_goal: Prepare and process dough by combining flour and water in a bowl, transferring the dough to a machine, and measuring additional flour.

episodes.name: Set up flour
episodes.description: The person picks up, places on the table, and opens a bag of flour.

3121a918-44a3-446a-b809-95e1b5766cb0.overall_goal: Wash, dry, and organize kitchenware using a sponge, soap, and water.

episodes.name: Store Tray
episodes.description: The person picks up a tray, carries it to the cupboard, places it inside, and closes the cupboard door.

312da1d0-9e56-4f5e-bb12-9cb67e8bc674.overall_goal: Set up and fuel a generator-driven watering system to water the plants and then shut it off.

episodes.name: Generator setup
episodes.description: The person presses a machine button, checks the generator, manages the tank lid, then picks up and connects the hose to the generator and adjusts it.

episodes.name: Fuel and watering
episodes.description: The person connects a wire, inspects and wipes, prepares and pours fuel into the generator, then aims the hose to spray water on the plants and finally turns the water off.

1f757b4c-032e-4012-a0f9-bb7c1a437612.overall_goal: Secure a hose using wire by wrapping, tying, twisting with pliers, then inspecting and finalizing the fastening.

episodes.name: Wrap and tighten
episodes.description: The person examines the hose, gathers wire and pliers, wraps and ties the wire around the hose, tightens it by twisting with pliers, and sets the tools down.

episodes.name: Inspect and secure
episodes.description: The person repositions the hose and wire, checks tightness, makes adjustments, and secures the wire in place.

4fcddb9e-38ad-4948-acf6-dd76e87f7eb3.overall_goal: Install, secure, and adjust a bicycle wheel through tightening, inspection, cleaning, and final adjustments.

episodes.name: Tighten with screwdriver
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver, tightens the wheel screws, and returns the tool to the toolbox.

39865b55-0b68-4cf9-a9fa-d55cfbc5909b.overall_goal: Assemble and secure engine components by installing the cover, checking alignment, and tightening fasteners.

episodes.name: Cover install and checks
episodes.description: The person inspects the engine, installs and screws in the cover, checks and adjusts alignment, then attaches and tightens a nut, placing tools on the workbench between steps.

episodes.name: Final fastenings
episodes.description: The person removes the hand from the nut, picks up tools, and performs final tightening on the engine with a wrench and screwdriver, setting the wrench on the workbench between tool changes.

4ad40842-5cee-49c2-a382-211fd7a4872b.overall_goal: Retrieve baked bread from the oven into a basket, then tidy the workspace and close the oven.

episodes.name: Prep and retrieve bread
episodes.description: The person sets the tray and basket on the table, opens the oven, uses a paddle to scoop bread from the oven, transfers it to the basket, and sets the paddle down.

episodes.name: Cleanup and arrange
episodes.description: The person brushes crumbs from the table, sets down the brush, returns the tray, closes the oven, picks up a spatula, arranges the bread, and places the spatula on the table.

72d27890-983d-48f8-8eed-7ca937424ca2.overall_goal: Use a rope to secure and extract a plant, then tidy the rope and uproot a weed.

episodes.name: Tie and tighten
episodes.description: The person picks up a rope, ties it around the plant, tightens by pulling, holds the rope, attempts pulling the plant, and loosens the surrounding soil.

episodes.name: Removal and cleanup
episodes.description: The person releases the rope, pulls the plant out and places it, unties and coils the rope, stores it in a toolbox, performs additional plant handling, removes the rope, and finally grips and uproots a weed.

a814274f-898a-4bc4-ad93-f764844bf03c.overall_goal: Prepare a wooden workpiece by cutting, drilling, measuring, and marking it, then fasten a screw and finally reposition the piece and remove tape.

episodes.name: Prepare and fasten wood
episodes.description: The person sequentially cuts, drills, measures, marks the wood, inserts a screw, tightens it, and returns the tools.

episodes.name: Reposition and clean
episodes.description: The person releases and re-places the wood on the workbench, holds it, removes tape, and sets the tape down.

82dc7a9e-a0a4-4611-8e49-960d6c77b326.overall_goal: Paint, secure, clean, and inspect a railing on a table.

episodes.name: Paint and tighten
episodes.description: The person paints the railing, repositions a chair, tightens a bolt with a screwdriver, then cleans the railing with a brush before setting items down.

episodes.name: Wipe and inspect
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, wipes the railing, and inspects the result.

7070897e-556f-421a-b662-551fe2ab7fb5.overall_goal: Seal a container with its lid and secure it with tape, verifying the final attachment.

episodes.name: Prepare and Seal
episodes.description: The person cleans the container, places items, aligns and secures the lid, then prepares tape by cutting a piece.

episodes.name: Tape and Check
episodes.description: The person sets down tools, applies tape around the lidâ€™s edge, smoothens it, and checks the attachment.

3619f6fe-9722-4e98-ac1a-372821f1ec78.overall_goal: Organize and stow various items in and around the car, including the trunk and glove box.

episodes.name: Load bag in trunk
episodes.description: The person opens the trunk, picks up a bag with both hands, and places it into the trunk.

3db79f36-a611-42f6-bfb7-76cf7720a00a.overall_goal: Sew a fabric piece and perform finishing touches

episodes.name: Sew initial seam
episodes.description: The person picks up needle and thread, sews through the fabric while pulling and tightening the thread, then sets the needle and thread on the workbench.

episodes.name: Thread and finish
episodes.description: The person cuts and handles thread, threads the needle, examines and adjusts the fabric, trims excess thread with scissors, and smoothens the fabric, returning tools to the workbench.

39653b45-9792-4ef2-bc6b-945431870ce3.overall_goal: Knit by forming an initial loop, then manage yarn and tools to continue stitching with checks and adjustments.

episodes.name: Form first stitch
episodes.description: The person picks up yarn and needle, inserts and wraps the yarn to create a loop, pulls and tightens it, then adjusts and sets the needle down.

episodes.name: Cut, inspect, knit
episodes.description: The person releases yarn, uses scissors to cut the yarn end, inspects the fabric, then continues knitting with pulls, tightening, checks, holds, and final adjustments.

0da6e15a-d33b-4a61-bfce-1fb28d893637.overall_goal: Crochet stitches by manipulating yarn with a crochet hook while adjusting tension.

episodes.name: Setup and First Stitch
episodes.description: The person gathers yarn and hook, forms and pulls a first loop while checking and adjusting tension, then tightens and places items before releasing the yarn.

episodes.name: Stitch Repetition and Adjustment
episodes.description: The person repeatedly crochets by wrapping yarn over the hook, pulling through loops, alternating picking up and putting down the hook, and adjusting stitch tightness.

f8442573-f48f-4f2b-9f22-b208f916aa63.overall_goal: Clean the hose and surrounding area, then coil and store the hose properly.

episodes.name: Hold and clean hose
episodes.description: The person stabilizes the hose, wipes it with a rag, and then puts the rag away.

episodes.name: Dispose debris, coil hose
episodes.description: The person discards debris, then untangles, stretches, rolls, carries, places, and adjusts the hose onto a hanger.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, put, untangle, stretch, release, hold, arrange, roll, carry, place, adjust

49374bc5-0999-49dc-88bd-c42c0d54365f.overall_goal: Wash and dry a car using a rag, bucket, and hose.

episodes.name: Pre-wash wiping
episodes.description: The person wets and uses a rag to wipe the car, periodically rinsing and wringing the rag.

9f9f42f0-b9fc-4247-8dad-3ef0ff36e402.overall_goal: Clean and finish a piece of wood by brushing debris, then treating the surface with oil, sanding, and wiping.

episodes.name: Brush items clean
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush, holds wood and a leaf, brushes them clean, then puts down the brush and releases the leaf.

episodes.name: Finish wood surface
episodes.description: The person applies oil to the wood, sands it with sandpaper, and wipes it with a cloth, putting each tool down after use.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: release

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, apply, put-down, sand, wipe

6f082d5d-5f31-4358-b2dc-16d320312ab3.overall_goal: Prepare and cook dough strips, then cut and separate them and clean up.

episodes.name: Roll, fry, clean
episodes.description: The person rolls dough, fries and flips dough strips, transfers them to a plate, then kneads, sprinkles flour, cleans the table, and puts tools away.

episodes.name: Cut and separate
episodes.description: The person cuts the dough with a cutter, uses a scraper to separate dough strips, and places the tools back on the table.

6287465a-ef00-49db-b730-1e1c22e77790.overall_goal: Clean the floor by sweeping debris into a dustpan and disposing it into a trash bin.

episodes.name: Organize tools
episodes.description: The person picks up the broom and dustpan and places them into the storage area.

1695475c-e527-43e6-b70e-69fd33023148.overall_goal: Prepare, secure, and connect wiring to a socket

episodes.name: Wire prep and fastening
episodes.description: The person prepares and routes the wire, fastens hardware on the socket, applies insulation tape, and trims the wire while placing tools aside between steps.

episodes.name: Cable to socket
episodes.description: The person picks up a cable and a socket with both hands and inserts the cable into the socket.

d6de6eee-b844-49c9-81d4-325fb9697ef6.overall_goal: Prepare nut-filled cracker sandwiches and plate them.

episodes.name: Arrange crackers
episodes.description: The person arranges crackers on a plate using both hands.

e435eea1-e4f7-4eef-970e-227152032a08.overall_goal: Clean, move, and manage the lid of a keg.

episodes.name: Fill and Rinse Keg
episodes.description: The person fills a cup from the faucet, pours water into the keg, then opens the faucet and uses a hose to rinse the keg before closing and releasing the faucet.

episodes.name: Move Keg and Lid
episodes.description: The person puts down the hose, moves the keg between shelf and faucet, then places and tightens the lid before unscrewing and removing it.

aa2975d0-9339-4ebf-8f3a-bbdf91bf82ed.overall_goal: Collect soil into a container, mix it, then seal and shake the container.

episodes.name: Tool setup
episodes.description: The person picks up a trowel and holds the container with the other hand.

episodes.name: Collect and mix
episodes.description: The person collects soil from a bucket with a trowel, pours it into the container repeatedly, stirs, then sets down the trowel and positions the container to remove and set down the lid.

episodes.name: Inspect and seal
episodes.description: The person holds and inspects the mixture, sets the container down, replaces and closes the lid, then picks up and shakes the container.

fdb68b7b-f09f-4a71-a85c-b02e728e9566.overall_goal: Assemble and service a bicycle wheel and tire at a workbench, using glue and tools to fit, tighten, loosen, and remove components.

episodes.name: Prep and glue
episodes.description: The person moves the bicycle to the workbench, attaches the wheel, inserts a bolt, and applies glue to the tire.

episodes.name: Fit tire, tighten
episodes.description: The person prepares the tire with a cloth, fits it onto the wheel using a screwdriver, and tightens the bolt with a wrench.

episodes.name: Disassemble wheel-tire
episodes.description: The person loosens and removes the bolt, removes and places the wheel on the workbench, loosens the tire from the wheel, and then removes the tire.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: release, hold, remove

19ed57bf-e23d-425b-a396-30daa1d5e750.overall_goal: Perform maintenance on a motorcycle and scooter, including tyre handling, fastener checks/tightening, cleaning, and disassembly.

episodes.name: Tyre remove-refit
episodes.description: The person removes the tyre from the motorcycle, places it on the floor, then picks it up and fits it back on.

episodes.name: Check and tighten
episodes.description: The person checks the scooter and tightens a screw and a motorcycle bolt using a spanner and a wrench, placing tools on the workbench after use.

episodes.name: Inspect and disassemble
episodes.description: The person inspects and cleans the motorcycle, then removes fasteners from the motorcycle and scooter using various tools, placing items on the workbench.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: inspect, pick-up, wipe-off, place, unscrew, put-down, loosen, remove

d4346ac0-ef62-405b-9086-4ee0085af9ab.overall_goal: Install two ceiling holders using a ladder and a screwdriver, repositioning the ladder between installations.

episodes.name: Install first holder
episodes.description: The person takes a screwdriver and a holder from pockets, holds the holder to the ceiling, screws it in, and releases it.

episodes.name: Reposition and second install
episodes.description: The person stows the tool, climbs down, moves and places the ladder to a new location, gathers another holder and pockets tools, climbs, then takes out the tool and holder to install and release the second holder.

episodes.name: Stow screwdriver
episodes.description: The person puts the screwdriver back into the pocket after finishing.

c9f5958f-ea3f-452e-913d-4f6ede7decea.overall_goal: Prune and manage vegetation by cutting vines, disposing the cuttings, and tying then removing a plant using rope.

episodes.name: Gather tools and rope
episodes.description: The person picks up a pruner from the pack, picks up rope from the waist, then puts the pruner back into the pack.

episodes.name: Prune, dispose, tie
episodes.description: The person holds and cuts vine with a pruner, carries the vine to a bin and puts it in, sets down and later picks up rope to tie a plant, then holds and pulls the plant out.

f643d88a-92cc-456d-bed7-c010275637e8.overall_goal: Tend the garden by weeding, trimming vines, collecting debris, and watering plants.

episodes.name: Weed removal
episodes.description: The person pulls out a weed and places it on the ground.

99158929-5e0b-4fa5-948c-9791c25cf0ac.overall_goal: Prepare and organize papers on a table by repositioning sheets, extracting them from a booklet, and handling the booklet.

episodes.name: Paper repositioning
episodes.description: The person repeatedly picks up a paper from the table, adjusts it, and places it back.

f0beca54-3ef3-4c5f-a3e3-c10478e624b5.overall_goal: Service a bicycle pedal by removing it, repositioning it on the bike, and securing its nut with tools.

episodes.name: Initial check and approach
episodes.description: The person tests and moves the pedal while approaching the bicycle.

episodes.name: Pedal service and reassembly
episodes.description: Using a spanner and pliers, the person removes the pedal, sets it on the workbench, repositions it on the bicycle, tightens it, services the nut, and finally secures the nut before putting down the tools.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, hold, loosen, remove, put-down, move, position, tighten, place, inspect, attach

1cddd647-6aaf-49ed-b09d-922d729453a8.overall_goal: Sort books by picking them up, examining them, and placing them onto the bookshelf, with some books first staged onto a table.

episodes.name: Shelve from heap
episodes.description: The person picks up a book from a heap, examines it, and places it on the bookshelf using hand1.

d19faa97-b823-4c1d-b00b-e9839f1a2391.overall_goal: Consult a book and tune a guitar, then set the book on a stand to read.

episodes.name: Read and annotate
episodes.description: The person picks up and opens a book, flips pages, marks it, and reads while holding it in hand.

episodes.name: Tune guitar, set stand
episodes.description: The person picks up and tunes the guitar, then places the book on a stand, adjusts both stand and book, and reads from it.
